title: Facebook : monthly brand profile follower growth 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Growth rate in the y axis.
The Growth rate is highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
There is a difference of 3.18 between the maximum Month Sep '17 and minimum Month Nov '17.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Growth rate in the y axis.
Month Sep '17 has the highest Growth rate and Nov '17 has the lowest Growth rate.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Growth rate in the y axis.
The Growth rate is highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
There is a difference of 3.18 between the maximum Month Sep '17 and minimum Month Nov '17.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth rate for 5 number of Months.
Month Sep '17 has the highest Growth rate and Nov '17 has the lowest Growth rate.
Second maximum Growth rate is found at Month Aug '17.
There is a difference of 3.18 between the maximum Month Sep '17 and minimum Month Nov '17.
The Month Sep '17 has the highest Growth rate, followed by Aug '17, and Dec '17. Down to the Month Nov '17 which is the lowest.
Overall Growth rate has increased over the Months.
Month Nov '17, and Oct '17 have a similar Growth rate that is 0.1.
The highest value 3.28 at Sep '17 is almost 3.34 times larger than the average value 0.98.
The Growth rate is 4.91 if we add up values of all Months.
